mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.ddbh AS "ddbh", a.je AS "je", a.lx AS "lx", a.state AS "state", a.issp AS "issp", a.spr AS "spr.id", su.name AS "spr.name", a.spsj AS "spsj", a.cHouse AS "cHouse.id", ch.name AS "cHouse.name", a.supplier_id AS "supplier.id", csu.name AS "supplier.name", a.store_id AS "store.id", cst.name AS "store.name", a.rkckdate AS "rkckdate", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.sjje AS "sjje", a.htje AS "htje"
LEFT JOIN c_house ch ON ch.id=a.cHouse LEFT JOIN c_supplier csu ON a.supplier_id=csu.id LEFT JOIN c_store cst ON a.store_id=cst.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id=a.spr

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_rkckddinfo( id, ddbh, je, lx, state, issp, spr, spsj, cHouse, supplier_id, store_id, rkckdate, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, del_flag, sjje, htje ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{ddbh}, #{je}, #{lx}, #{state}, #{issp}, #{spr.id}, #{spsj}, #{cHouse.id}, #{supplier.id}, #{store.id}, #{rkckdate}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{sjje}, #{htje} )
mapper.update: UPDATE c_rkckddinfo SET ddbh = #{ddbh}, je = #{je}, lx = #{lx}, state = #{state}, issp = #{issp}, spr = #{spr.id}, spsj = #{spsj}, cHouse = #{cHouse.id}, supplier_id = #{supplier.id}, store_id = #{store.id}, rkckdate = #{rkckdate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks}, sjje=#{sjje}, htje=#{htje} WHERE id = #{id}
